c74object.name: MaxScore.Editor
c74object.description:
MaxScore.Editor
is a GUI designed for editing MaxScore scores directly in a Max Window.
Access MaxScore Editor by the "Paste from" menu after right-clicking on an empty space of a patch window.
Open Editor window by clicking on the "Open Editor" button inside the bpatcher.

method.name: anything
method.description: MaxScore.Editor accepts all messages intended for the mxj com.algomusic.max.MaxScore object, as mentioned in the MaxScore Dictionary.

entry.name: list
entry.description: n: Note dimensions for playback d: Extra note dimensions for playback s: Entire sequence dump i: Info message r: Drawing message
